response.original_title: สิ่งเหล่านั้น
response.overview: On the final day of high school, what would you remember? Something that lingers in your mind during the last moments of a high schooler's life, about to step into the world of university. The journey through familiar places, yet each moment in time carries with it priceless memories. Every location tells a story of identity, relationships, connections, and the nostalgia of those moments spent here, at Phimai Wittaya School.
response.title: Things
